snippet.title: Atama - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
ATAMA

Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2019840/Atama/

Follow our official Twitter for announcements:
@teamzutsuu

A few pals and I decided to make a survival horror! Coming October 2022.

Atama is a stealth horror game inspired by PS2 Horror Games and Junji Ito's Hanging Balloons. In other words, you can see through the eyes of giant heads trying kill you.

From the minds of me, my pals Hunter, orenronen, ICat, Raqus and JonnyMcBane.

More formally:

ABOUT THIS GAME
ATAMA is a stealth horror game set in an isolated Japanese village. Full of devilish puzzles and sinister creatures, with a gameplay focus on seeing through the eyes of enemies, ATAMA aims to deliver a fresh experience to the genre.

You don't believe in family curses, do you?
Kaede's family had always told her stories about eccentric Aunt Noriko, but she's a superstitious old woman, living so far outside of the city. She has no phone, no Internet... Kaede only knew her via infrequent letters... until they stopped coming.

Distant relatives drift apart all the time, but the last letter was different: Deranged ravings about "your birthright" and "the family curse". What did any of it mean?

Kaede decides to hop the next train out toward the sea. To Aunt Noriko. To her birthright.

To a nightmare she never saw coming.

Features
- See through the eyes of enemies to discover their routes and avoid their gaze, considering you are unable to fight back
- Use your wits to solve puzzles
- Uncover the mystery of the cursed village
- Includes Hardcore Mode
- Includes Developer Commentary
